English:
v. fear; dread; be afraid of
adv. [indicating an estimation and anxiety] for fear of
[indicating an estimation] perhaps; probably; maybe
Example:
他恐怕遲到, 一早就起來了。Tā kǒngpà chídào, yīzǎo jiù qǐlai le.
He got up very early for fear of being late.


恐怕要下雨。Kǒngpà yào xià yǔ.
It looks like rain.


這樣做恐怕不行。Zhèyàng zuò kǒngpà bùxíng.
I’m afraid this won’t do.


他走了恐怕有十來天了。Tā zǒu le kǒngpà yǒu shí lái tiān le.
It’s been almost ten days since he left.

On this point, I have different ideas
